name: 【SP #33】未來啟點｜Future Revelation
description:
【夢境故事】

我穿越時空，抵達未來之境。落地窗外是熙攘都市，漫天飛舞的汽車，和薄霧般的雲朵。我置身於一個高貴的辦公室，它鋪滿紅色的地毯，書櫃上陳列著無盡智慧的寶藏，當中不乏東方哲學和道家的經典。



未來的我端坐於茶几旁，三十而立的風範令人讚嘆。在茶香縈繞之中，我領悟到萬物的因果法則，過去的種種，交織成現在的果實，而我所做的每一個決定，都在鋪墊著未來的道路。

－

【Dream Story】

I traversed time and space and arrived in a future realm. Outside the floor-to-ceiling windows lay a bustling metropolis, with cars soaring through the sky and wispy clouds floating above. I found myself in a noble office, adorned with a red carpet and a bookshelf filled with treasures of endless wisdom, including classics of Eastern philosophy and Taoism.



The future me sat gracefully beside the coffee table, exuding the elegance of a thirty-something. Amidst the fragrance of tea, I comprehended the law of cause and effect, realizing that all of the past intertwined to bear fruit in the present, and every decision I made paved the way for the future.
